select id,head_portrait_url as headPortraitUrl,nickname,email,birthday,integral,occupation,sex, cumulative_sign as cumulativeSign,continuous_learning as continuousLearning,currency, create_time as createTime,name,mobile,sex,invite_code as inviteCode,currency,by_invite as byInvite, continuous_sign as continuousSign,last_sign as lastSign,cumulative_learning as cumulativeLearning, status,learning_goal as learningGoal,age_group as ageGroup from lt_user
AND `name` LIKE concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%') AND nickname LIKE concat(concat('%',#{nickname}),'%') AND email LIKE concat(concat('%',#{email}),'%') AND mobile LIKE concat(concat('%',#{mobile}),'%') AND learning_goal LIKE concat(concat('%',#{learningGoal}),'%') AND age_group LIKE concat(concat('%',#{ageGroup}),'%')
order by createTime desc
